title: Wordify
description: an interactive digital dictionary application that makes it easy for users to find the meaning, pronunciation, synonyms, and antonyms of various words.

title: DreamCost
description: A web application that helps users estimate the future price of an item by taking into account the annual inflation rate.

title: JobFilter
description: A simple job search web app designed to showcase intuitive filtering features.

title: EasyCookin'
description: An easy to use website for finding recipes from around the world.
